description:
Blair Maynard (Michael Caine) finally turns the tables on the pirates who kidnapped his son.

In The Island, a journalist investigating mysterious disappearances in the Bermuda Triangle finds himself trapped by a colony of modern-day pirates—until they make the mistake of crossing a father with nothing left to lose.
